Quests

Kaladim has many job opportunities for enterprising individuals. Some of these can have very lucrative rewards. I'm not about to give you a full-out, comprehensive guide to all the quests available in Kaladim, but I will point you in the right direction.

Talk to Byzar Bloodforge and Canloe Nusback in Stormguard Hall. They're giving bounties on certain items.

Beno, also in Stormguard Hall, might have a lucrative mission for you, but you've got to prove yourself first.

You can get some nice armor from Vacto Mounel, if you provide him with the correct components and can meet his price.

If you can prove your devotion to the Clerics of Underfoot, you can recieve a reward.

The Paladins also need help against some feathered fiends.

The Butcherblock Bandits and the Miner's Guild 628 have been enemies for a long time. If you prove yourself worthy, Jeet might let you loose against them.
